::Alpha::

"Listen up Predacons <over comlink> I have a plan. Somehow Prowl the 
bird is absent the base is being gaurded by a Frog and Mastadon. So 
we storm the base attacking from all angles north, west, etc. We take 
over the base and set the base to self detanation. We jet out of 
there any living maximlas we take hostage. Then with the maximlas 
with out a base and with 2 maximals held for randsom the will have to 
give up."

*transforms into robot and awaits response*
